SELECT c_client_attr1.id, c_client.client_code, c_client_attr1.`name` cname, c_client_attr1.location, c_client_attr1.lamp_pole_num, c_client_upload_status.temperature, c_client_upload_status.voltage, c_client_upload_status.power_factor, c_client_upload_status.`status`,c_client_upload_status.brightness,
c_client_attr1.`comment`, c_client_upload_status.tdate FROM c_client LEFT JOIN c_client_attr1 ON c_client.id = c_client_attr1.c_client_id LEFT JOIN c_client_upload_status ON c_client.id = c_client_upload_status.c_client_id
WHERE 1=1 AND c_client_attr1.sys_user_id IN ${pd.userids}
and ( c_client_attr1.`name` LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{pd.cname}),'%') )
and ( c_client.client_code LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{pd.ccode}),'%') )
and ( c_client_attr1.location LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{pd.location}),'%') )
and ( c_client_upload_status.`status` = #{pd.lstatus} )
GROUP BY c_client.id
SELECT * FROM b_status WHERE b_status_main_id = 4 AND `value` = #{lstatus}

SELECT
c_client.client_code, c_client_attr1.*, c_client_upload_status.*, c_gateway_attr1.`name` gateway_name, c_lamp_pole_type.`name` lamp_name
FROM c_client LEFT JOIN c_client_attr1 ON c_client.id = c_client_attr1.c_client_id LEFT JOIN c_client_upload_status ON c_client_attr1.id = c_client_upload_status.c_client_id
LEFT JOIN c_gateway_attr1 ON c_gateway_attr1.c_gateway_id IN (SELECT c_client_gateway.c_gateway_id FROM c_client_gateway WHERE c_client_gateway.c_client_id = c_client.id) LEFT JOIN c_lamp_pole_type ON c_lamp_pole_type.id IN (SELECT c_client_attr2.c_lamp_pole_type_id FROM c_client_attr2 WHERE c_client_attr2.c_client_id = c_client.id)
WHERE 1=1 AND c_client_attr1.sys_user_id = #{sys_user_id} AND c_client_attr1.id = #{id}

and ( id = #{pd.str_id} )
